Hi all,

Just wanted to give a heads up on the SF Show. As per last year, Jim  
Gilbert and I will be putting out a collection of Kanayama and Owari  
tsuba along with a few extra pieces and Ko-Mino fittings along with  
about 12 sets of koshirae. Our presentation will be on Friday at 1.  
Hope to see all of you there.

Gordon
